original_title: 人妻の浮気心 藤森里穂
overview: Mr. Fujimori, who runs a trimming salon. His hobby is photography of his dog, and the other is sex. She works with her husband about three times a week and cheerfully says that sex is the best diet. Apparently, the current style is what I got from sex ... She came with such a sense of diet exercise, and she sweats naughty with intense exercise called sex in search of further beauty.
title: The Infidelity Of A Married Woman – Riho Fujimori
